column4: Hello! When I try to boot into Ubunto 10,04 on my computer it hangs on the following error message: "nForce_smbus 0000:00:01.1: Error Probing SMB2". I've tried googling but I can't follow the fixes (also, it hangs, and won't boot further). Halp!
Also, I know literally NOTHING about Ubuntu, I just migrated from windows like, a few days ago,
